idea:
Dexter BrewLabs intends on bringing a breath of fresh air to the beverage ecosystem in India, headed by Arvind Arul

Passionate about the beverage and alcoholic beverages market and is invested in identifying gaps that could create new product segments within the ever-changing ecosystem

There is a paucity of brands that make environmentally friendly drinks that don’t compromise on taste or health. This brought DBL to envision their first product - FLO Seltzer; a soft seltzer brand that strongly believes in being sustainable, healthy, environmentally friendly and carbon neutral.

FLO Seltzers are lightly flavoured, lightly carbonated drinks and a touch of sweetness from Stevia makes it a perfect refresher by itself or a delicious mixer for your favourite spirit. In mid-2021, FLO plans to launch its range of uniquely flavoured hard seltzers which will be lightly alcoholic, at an ABV of 5-6%.
name: Flo Seltzer

idea:
We provide educational services and embrace various mentorship & skill development programs that impart quality training with a wide variety of subjects. Qualified and specialised educators assure this quality. Our two major programmes are Teacher mentorship and Student mentorship. We offer these services to schools, colleges, universities and training centres. Our clientele list extends to individual fresh candidates getting into the educational teaching-learning framework, individual students looking to upgrade their academic knowledge. The company also provides consultancy and expertise to the IB schools globally, looking for authorisation or evaluation processes.

In today’s scientific and technological driven world with new challenges and uncertainties, we redefine the contours by exemplifying teaching and learning. We empower the trainees in achieving progressive confidence and success with strategic teaching and learning expertise.

We aim to develop confidence, upgrade the knowledge and skills of teachers, students and schools, thereby making the education system more robust and prolific.
name: JOYAVIATE EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Nidaash is an e-commerce lifestyle and fashion brand dealing in women fashion accessories and home decor. For more info, visit - www.nidaash.com
name: Nidaash

idea:
Hridyah Boutique is an e-commerce company and we are currently providing Maternity and Nursing wear at affordable rates to budget buyers.


In the entire process of our business, we provide freelance works to women who are housewives or temporarily jobless, so that they can earn a marginal income for their expenses.


Our motto is to create work for Women at home willing to spend their time and skills productively for a better living.


Our vision is to provide designer fashion wears at affordable prices to consumers.
name: HRIDYAH BOUTIQUE (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Ashish rent a Car is Well known Car Rental firm In Mumbai and providing Vehicle to Customer all main Cities of India.
name: ASHISH RENT A CAR

idea:
PTS Systems & Soltuions Pvt Ltd is one of the fastest growing ERP Service provider in India. The Company has achieved great success and built a reputation for on-time delivery of intricate solutions to Large and Small & Mid Sized Enterprises (SME's) in diverse industry verticals. PTS3 is managed by highly experienced professionals with experience in industry ranging from 15-25 years.

Our objective is to provide the management of business enterprises with more value, control and visibility through successful implementation of ERP and business management solutions that bring tangible and measurable benefits with improved operational efficiency, profitability and growth. We aim to be responsive to the management's needs and expectations and also to re-engineer the business process to improve productivity and reduce cost of operations for a better ROI.

We understand and speak your language having successfully implemented solutions across various industry verticals and geographies. We provide cost effective solutions in the domain of IT services, ERP & Business Management Application software with committed and experienced professionals having expertise in various domains
name: PTS SYSTEMS & SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Urjani Fuels Private Limited is a company which is planning for fuel supply to the consumer with the technique of fuel supply Door To Door and reduces human efforts and time of the consumer. The company is based in Mumbai City Maharashtra, India. We are trying to take the world to the next level in the door to door diesel delivery. We are making the vision of our company very clear that we want to provide the fuel to every needy person who is not able to go the fuel pump for refueling their vehicles. We want to provide diesel to the consumers to their place. Make the world stop doing outdated things and bring them the new concept of diesel delivery to increase work efficiency
name: URJANI FUELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: PBT DISTRIBUTORS PRIVATE LIMITED IS A DISTRIBUTION NETWORK OF ANTICANCER PRODUCTS WITH A UNIQUE CONCEPT.
name: PBT DISTRIBUTORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Registered as a private limited company with the intent to provide all requisite products/services to industries, business houses, government and semi-government agencies.
name: DYNAVITA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
To carry on in India and abroad the business of distributors, transporter, traders, retailers, marketing and suppliers by creating online link

with the customer, to advertise and promote the business online for distribution of petrol, diesel, Light diesel, High speed diesel, LPG,

Engine Oil, CNG, CBG, LNG and other related products with the help of an ecommerce website and/or mobile applications and to ensure

maintenance of continuous and smooth supplies of petroleum products by way of reselling and transportation and to further enhance

marketing infrastructure and reseller network for providing assured service to customers throughout the country and to do all such act

which is necessary to attainment of the main object.
name: HALITE ENTERPRISES FUEL LLP
